application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details require for Condition 7 (Construction Logistics Plan) for planning permission 19/02089/HOU (Erection of two storey side and rear extension, front porch extension, bay windows to front elevation at ground and first floor level with gable and pitched roofs, alterations to raise roof height with one front and two rear dormer roof extensions to facilitate loft conversion)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 7 (Construction Logistics Plan) of planning permission 19/02089/HOU the proposal fails to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers would be safeguarded, or that highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be maintained in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
